newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-Sept fertiliser output up 10.2 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-Sept fertiliser output up 10.2 pct yr/yr.

text.p: China's output of chemical fertiliser was 19.1 million tonnes in January to September, a rise of 10.2 percent compared with the year-ago period, the Financial News said on Wednesday.
Output had reached nearly 80 percent of the target for 1996, the newspaper said.
About 90 percent of small-scale fertiliser plants were in production while 100 percent of large and medium-sized factories were running, it said.
Production of agricultural pesticides was 285,000 tonnes in the first nine months, up 29 percent from the year-ago period, the newspaper said.
Pesticide output in September alone was up 7.2 percent from September 1995 to hit 22,000 tonnes, it said.
The actual production value of China's chemical industry reached 188.38 billion yuan ($22.7 billion) in the period, up 13.7 percent, it said without giving further details.
